Date: 2025-09-03 15:51
Subject: Incident Update Notification: Email functionality Issue
--------------------------------------------------
 

 <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/> 

 

Dear Colleagues,

 

We are still investigating the issue affecting certain services which utilize email functionality.  This not affecting regular business email.  Services such as network scanning and printing may be impacted, and certain automatically delivered reports will be delayed.  This is being addressed with the utmost urgency.  Further updates will be provided in the next hour, or sooner if the issue is resolved in the meantime.

 

Issue Summary:

*	Email supported functions such as network scanning and report delivery not working or delayed.

 

Business Impact:

*	Network printers and scanners wonâ€™t work
*	Mail notification using email relay will be delayed

 

Start Date and Time: Wed, 3 Sep 12:23 PM

For support during this period, please raise a ticket via OneReach. You can also check real-time status updates via the Tech&Data System Status & Health <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/>  Dashboard.

 

 

 

This mail was sent to you by

 <https://onereach.chalhoub.com/support/home>
